snippet.title: PlayStation®Move Ape Escape Gameplay Trailer (E3)
snippet.description:
Check out the official trailer for the next chapter in the Ape Escape saga; an original new adventure full of monkeys and mayhem designed exclusively for the PlayStation®Move!
Featuring 15 diverse levels and co-op Mayhem to play with your friends, PlayStation®Move Ape Escape™ is more fun than a barrel of.... well, you get the idea.

http://us.playstation.com/games-and-media/games/play-station-move-ape-escape-ps3.html

 (c)2011 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. Ape Escape is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
